About Me

Me in a nutshell

BIO

I am an experienced regional manager who brings team building, leadership, marketing, and sales into the web development world. I really love programming on the front end. Seeing my code come to life brings me much excitement. Ultimately, I would like see myself as a project manager so I can develop a team of my own to do the same thing.

Currently, I am the QA for an app called SPA. It is a suicide prevention app. I have to opportunity to challenge myself in testing an application for formatting issues and also testing the feel of the user experience.

ISD Innovations

UI/UX Tester and QA

Tested a Suicide Prevention App to make sure it was user friendly. Wrote test scripts to test app functionality. Communicated with fellow development team members of issues and logged through ASANA. Had weekly sprints where we had a Saturday stand-up through video call.

Learning Fuze

Web Developer

Accelerated web development program where I learned javaScript, html 5, css 3, react js, node js. Successfully completed two, 2-day hackathons where we were given the opportunity to work in groups and use jQuery and rest APIs.

Winco Foods

Produce Supervisor Southwest Divisionr

Developed a team of managers in California, Arizona, Nevada, and Texas to hit company goals.
